episodes.title: Preview: A Deadly Nazi Cult in Chile | True Crime Reports
episodes.description:
How was a secret Nazi cult allowed to operate in Chile for nearly 40 years? 

Colonia Dignidad, run by former Nazi Paul Schäfer, was home to child abuse and torture. 

So why did the Chilean Pinochet government not only allow this to happen - but support it?

In a story that goes right to the heart of the German and Chilean governments, what justice can the victims themselves hope for?

Watch the full episode on Sunday, April 6, here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzGHKb8i9vTwJ_Smu6j10KfJZjhLPbHYj&si=NqpCNV_kz3W8Rwqj
